body_html: Adding a #define means we will need a "--config=verbs" in the bazel build command line, right? Our early internal version had that. I hated it because I had to enable verbs in two places, one is in ./configure, the other is "bazel build --config=verbs". If this is what it takes, I will resurrect that code. I will take a look at the example you mentioned.

body: Adding a #define means we will need a "--config=verbs" in the bazel build command line, right? Our early internal version had that. I hated it because I had to enable verbs in two places, one is in ./configure, the other is "bazel build --config=verbs". If this is what it takes, I will resurrect that code.
